title: Advanced English Proficiency Program Using AI-Driven Adaptive Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English grammar and vocabulary proficiency, basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Establishment of individualized learning environments using digital devices, with motivation reinforcement through gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20+ point improvement in vocabulary and reading scores based on the TOEFL iBT scale after six months.
Learners improve speaking fluency (Fluency) by over 30% through an AI feedback system.
Learners utilize accurate English expressions in real communication contexts with over 85% accuracy through project-based assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
